skins.shipDescription: Well met. I'm Kizuna AI, the new addition to your base. I will do all in my power to be at least of some use. It is a pleasure meeting you, Commander.
skins.selfIntroduction: I am the embodyment of cuteness and etiquette! Please, enjoy the splendor of this smarter and more refined Kizuna AI!
skins.acquisition: Well met. I'm Kizuna AI, the new addition to your base. I will do all in my power to be at least of some use. It is a pleasure meeting you, Commander.
skins.login: Welcome back, Commander. Soon it will be time for our scheduled meeting. Let's get a lot of work done today.
skins.details: Please, feel at ease. Although my elegant uniform may steal your attention, I am still very much the intelligent super A.I. Kizuna AI I have always been.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, Hood invited me to a tea party. Would you perhaps like to attend it as well?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Formal attire certainly aids one's composure... Belfast, if you don't mind, would you kindly teach me the Royal Navy's etiquette?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, would it be agreeable with you if I uploaded videos from this base? I am quite talented at video making, you see.
skins.secretaryTouch: Please, do you not know uncouth it is to touch a lady nonchalantly?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: You are guilty. There is no room for alternate interpretations. You are guilty.
